items.summary:
New on the Engineering Blog: Quantifying infrastructure noise in agentic coding evals.

Infrastructure configuration can swing agentic coding benchmarks by several percentage points‚Äîsometimes more than the leaderboard gap between top models.

Read more: https://t.co/DY7jCj8GAP

items.title: New Engineering blog: We tasked Opus 4.6 using agent teams to build a C compiler. Then we (mostly) w
items.summary:
New Engineering blog: We tasked Opus 4.6 using agent teams to build a C compiler. Then we (mostly) walked away. Two weeks later, it worked on the Linux kernel. 

Here's what it taught us about the future of autonomous software development.

items.title: AI can make work faster, but a fear is that relying on it may make it harder to learn new skills on
items.summary:
AI can make work faster, but a fear is that relying on it may make it harder to learn new skills on the job.

items.summary:
